name: spoc-lmsc
description: SPOC (Small Private Online Course) application with Node.js, React, PostgreSQL, Bootstrap, and Tailwind CSS

scripts.start: npm run build && npm run server
scripts.build: cd client && npx tailwindcss -i src/index.css -o public/styles/output.css && npm run build
scripts.setup: npm run install-client && npm run install-server
scripts.docker-build: clear && npm run docker-clear && REGISTRY=${REGISTRY:-10.42.12.1:5000} NAMESPACE=${NAMESPACE:-} docker-compose -f docker/docker-compose.yml build --build-arg REGISTRY=$REGISTRY --build-arg NAMESPACE=$NAMESPACE

author: SPOC TEAM
